item.title: DOC
item.description: score:269 Chances: Healthpeak Properties, Inc. is a leading owner, operator, and developer of real estate for healthcare discovery and delivery, indicating potential growth opportunities in the healthcare real estate sector. The merger with Physicians Realty Trust positions Healthpeak well to capitalize on secular trends in the industry, providing a potential boost to its financial performance.
